title: Playwright Target
description: Playwright target option for Build Facade

playwrightConfig.description: The path of the playwright configuration file (e.g. playwright.config.js or playwright.config.ts).

outputDir.description: The path to the output directory for artifacts produced by tests.

devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against.

headed.description: Displays the browser instead of running headlessly. Set this to 'true' if your run depends on a Chrome extension being loaded.

record.description: Whether or not Cypress should record the results of the tests

parallel.description: Whether or not Cypress should run its tests in parallel (CI only)

browser.description: The browser to run tests in.

env.description: A key-value Pair of environment variables to pass to Playwright runner

spec.description: A comma delimited glob string that is provided to the Playwright runner to specify which spec files to run. i.e. '**examples/**,**actions.spec**

ignoreTestFiles.description: A String or Array of glob patterns used to ignore test files that would otherwise be shown in your list of tests. Playwright uses minimatch with the options: {dot: true, matchBase: true}. We suggest using https://globster.xyz to test what files would match.

reporter.description: The reporter used during playwright run

reporterOptions.description: The reporter options used. Supported options depend on the reporter.

tag.description: A comma delimited list to identify a run with
